afdc6209096af959bb8a52bdf7d5aa6d (11:09): Like it says: Because the values are expected to be instances of type Object, however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as Int32 values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell. To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an Object array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments.
afdc6209096af959bb8a52bdf7d5aa6d (11:09): And that's the problem i'm having
afdc6209096af959bb8a52bdf7d5aa6d (11:10): It sees it as a single object (the array) and not as an array of objects
